sentences.sContent: We surmised you had gone to Ireland.
sentences.sContent_eng: We surmised you had gone to Ireland.
sentences.sCn: 我们还以为你去爱尔兰了呢，原来你并没去呀。

sentences.sContent: Etymology: over England; from one land to another; into Ireland.
sentences.sContent_eng: Etymology: over England; from one land to another; into Ireland.
sentences.sCn: 词源学：越过英格兰，从一个陆地到另一个陆地，爱尔兰。

sentences.sContent: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.sCn: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

phrases.pCn: 北爱尔兰自治区（在爱尔兰东北部）
